snippet.title: WIZORDUM - The Final Episode | Teaser | Coming March 5th 2025
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Wizordum, the ultimate boomer shooter inspired by retro FPS classics like Wolfenstein 3D, Catacomb Abyss, Hexen, and Heretic. With Episodes 1 and 2 already wowing Early Access players, Episode 3 launches on March 5, 2025, completing the journey. Take one of the last mages of Wizordum into over seven new fire-and-ice-themed levels filled with chaos, danger, and epic battles. Wield powerful new weapons like the Faewood Crossbow and the untamed Staff of Chaos to wage war against the keepers of Chaos in true Apogee fashion.

Packed with secret areas, easter eggs (yes, even a Dopefish!), and an in-game level editor with online level sharing, Wizordum blends old-school charm with modern gameplay. Whether you’re a die-hard retro FPS fan or new to boomer shooters, Wizordum’s colorful magic and challenging action will keep you hooked. Don’t miss the final episode - the game leaves Early Access this March!

GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/wizordum
